feed.title: NodeBB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NodeBB: v3.9.1
entry.content:
Release build (patch) of NodeBB @ 2024-09-25T16:02:01.267Z

v3.9.1 (2024-09-25)

Bug Fixes
  • closes #12819, add helper to escape tx strings (7d0c2cb6)
  • closes #12807, fix quick reply js error (06ac0c99)
Refactors
  • silence saas deprecations on prod (05e4307e)
  • remove deprecation warnings, still used from widgets (3cee59f9)

entry.title: New release for NodeBB: v3.10.0
entry.content:
Release build (minor) of NodeBB @ 2024-09-25T17:46:30.139Z

v3.10.0 (2024-09-25)

New Features
  • port updated service worker code to develop, allow plugins to define scripts to import into service worker (979954c2)
Refactors
  • silence saas deprecations on prod (3fdec51a)

entry.title: New release for NodeBB: v3.10.1
entry.content:
Release build (patch) of NodeBB @ 2024-10-09T13:48:03.391Z

v3.10.1 (2024-10-09)

Chores
  • up composer (a5f3d097)
Bug Fixes
  • deps: bump 2factor (712767f6)
Refactors
  • don't block ./nodebb upgrade if suggested modules are not loaded (39f57f9e)

entry.title: New release for NodeBB: v3.10.2
entry.content:
Release build (patch) of NodeBB @ 2024-10-18T13:15:57.182Z

v3.10.2 (2024-10-18)

Bug Fixes
  • closes #12848, add missing purge class (64779352)
Performance Improvements
  • make unread faster if there are 60k+ unread topics (f53f1394)
Refactors
  • single line (120b184e)
  • hide modal and show alert on success (a309918e)
  • more immediate feedback on category purge (72ccb870)

entry.title: New release for NodeBB: v3.10.3
entry.content:
Release build (patch) of NodeBB @ 2024-10-23T20:41:17.396Z

v3.10.3 (2024-10-23)

Bug Fixes
  • add missing await (0082ac98)
  • closes #12858 (e6ab4b07)
  • don't crash if profile folder doesn't exist (8a89c5d7)
